items.name: Ilorin Brick Builders' Haven
items.short_description: Unleash your creativity at Ilorin's premier LEGO construction zone, featuring themed building areas and a massive brick pit.
items.address: Plot 15, Offa Road, Tanke, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Kwara Kid's Construction Site
items.short_description: A hands-on park where children can design and build structures with oversized blocks and engage in engineering challenges.
items.address: Along Unity Road, GRA, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Mini City Builders' Lab
items.short_description: Explore miniature cityscapes and add your own creations to a growing urban landscape made entirely of interlocking bricks.
items.address: Shoprite Complex, Fate Road, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Creative Brick Yard
items.short_description: An expansive outdoor and indoor area dedicated to free-form brick play, encouraging imagination and collaboration.
items.address: Beside Kwara Hotel, Murtala Muhammed Way, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Ilorin Funland Carnival
items.short_description: Experience thrilling classic rides, gentle carousels, and exciting games for all ages in a vibrant carnival atmosphere.
items.address: Opposite Kwara State Stadium Complex, Offa Road, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Galaxy Spin Zone
items.short_description: Spin, twirl, and soar on a variety of space-themed rides, perfect for adventurous kids seeking an out-of-this-world experience.
items.address: Along Airport Road, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Rainbow Roller Coaster Park
items.short_description: Home to miniature roller coasters and a vibrant array of smaller rides designed specifically for younger children to enjoy safely.
items.address: Plot 7, Taiwo Road, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Splash & Twirl Lagoon
items.short_description: A unique amusement area featuring water-based rides, paddle boats, and gentle spinning attractions for a refreshing adventure.
items.address: Adjacent to Asa Dam Water Works, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Ilorin Young Minds Discovery Center
items.short_description: An interactive museum designed to ignite curiosity through hands-on exhibits covering science, art, and local culture.
items.address: Beside Kwara State Library, Ahmadu Bello Way, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Kwara Kids Heritage House
items.short_description: Explore the rich history and traditions of Kwara State through engaging exhibits and storytelling workshops for young learners.
items.address: Opposite Government House, Fate Road, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Future Innovators' Gallery
items.short_description: A museum focused on technology, innovation, and futuristic concepts, inspiring children to become the inventors of tomorrow.
items.address: University of Ilorin Road, Tanke, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Little Artists' Studio & Museum
items.short_description: Encouraging artistic expression, this museum features child-friendly art exhibits and practical art workshops.
items.address: Near Civil Service Clinic, New Yidi Road, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Prehistoric Kwara Valley
items.short_description: Step back in time to an ancient world populated by life-sized, animatronic dinosaurs, complete with roaring sounds and lush prehistoric flora.
items.address: Off University of Ilorin Teaching Hospital Road, Oke-Oyi, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Jurassic Juniors Safari
items.short_description: A gentler dinosaur experience for younger children, featuring smaller, friendly dinosaur models and a fossil digging sandbox.
items.address: Near Government Secondary School, Adeta Roundabout, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Dino Ridge Adventure Park
items.short_description: Combine the thrill of dinosaurs with adventure play. Explore trails, rope bridges, and slides surrounded by majestic dinosaur replicas.
items.address: Off Ganmo Road, Tanke, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Ancient Roar Exploration Zone
items.short_description: An immersive journey into the world of ancient beasts, featuring educational displays, excavation sites, and interactive dinosaur encounters.
items.address: Adjacent to Kwara State Poly, Sulu Gambari Road, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Fantasia Kids' Kingdom Ilorin
items.short_description: A magical theme park with diverse zones, including a fairytale land, an adventure jungle, and a futuristic city, all designed for young adventurers.
items.address: Along Ilorin-Ogbomosho Road, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Adventure Bay Explorers Park
items.short_description: Embark on an epic journey at Adventure Bay, offering themed rides, obstacle courses, and interactive challenges for brave young explorers.
items.address: Off Fate Road Extension, G.R.A., Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Sunshine Valley Funworld
items.short_description: A vibrant and cheerful theme park with gentle rides, splash pads, and imaginative play areas perfect for toddlers and preschoolers.
items.address: Along Asa Dam Road, Offa Road, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Mythical Forest Park
items.short_description: Journey into a themed park inspired by local folklore and mythical creatures, offering engaging narratives, gentle rides, and interactive exhibits.
items.address: Near the Kwara State University Campus, Malete Road, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Kwara Kids' Animal Farm & Petting Zoo
items.short_description: A charming petting zoo where children can interact closely with friendly farm animals, learn about animal care, and enjoy pony rides.
items.address: Off Taiwo Road, Behind NNPC Filling Station, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Ilorin Mini Wildlife Sanctuary
items.short_description: Discover a variety of local and exotic animals in a smaller, kid-friendly sanctuary, focusing on education and conservation.
items.address: Along University Road, Tanke, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Feather & Fur Friends Park
items.short_description: An inviting space dedicated to birds and small furry creatures, allowing gentle interaction and observation in a calm environment.
items.address: Behind Unilorin Zoological Garden (smaller section), Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Safari Kids Adventure Zone
items.short_description: A themed section of a larger park, offering supervised encounters with various kid-friendly animals and themed play areas.
items.address: Off Asa Dam Road, Near Sobi Barracks, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: The Ilorin Enchanted Stage
items.short_description: Witness awe-inspiring magic tricks and grand illusions performed by master illusionists, captivating audiences of all ages.
items.address: Kwara State Arts Council, Gerin Alimi Road, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Kids' Mystery Theatre
items.short_description: An interactive magic show tailored for children, featuring audience participation and easy-to-understand tricks.
items.address: Kwara State Amusement Park, Taiwo Road, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Illusion Palace of Kwara
items.short_description: Experience mind-bending illusions and spellbinding magic acts in a dedicated palace of wonder, perfect for family entertainment.
items.address: Along Offa Garage Road, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Wonderland Puppet & Magic Show
items.short_description: A delightful blend of puppet storytelling and simple magic tricks, charming younger audiences with whimsical performances.
items.address: Behind Kwara State Ministry of Education, Flower Garden, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Toon Town Square Ilorin
items.short_description: Meet and greet your favorite cartoon characters, take photos, and enjoy special performances in a lively, colorful setting.
items.address: Within Shoprite Mall, Fate Road, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Character Carnival Kwara
items.short_description: A rotating cast of beloved cartoon mascots joins for dancing, games, and memorable interactions in a festive carnival atmosphere.
items.address: Near General Hospital, New Yidi Road, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Storybook Friends Gathering
items.short_description: Encounter characters from classic children's stories and popular cartoons, offering engaging read-alongs and autograph sessions.
items.address: Kwara State Library Board, Ahmadu Bello Way, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Hero Squad Headquarters
items.short_description: Aspiring superheroes can meet their favorite animated heroes, participate in training exercises, and take memorable photos.
items.address: Off Sango-Kulende Road, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Ilorin Junior Innovators Lab
items.short_description: A cutting-edge science center offering interactive exhibits in physics, chemistry, and biology, designed to spark young scientific minds.
items.address: University of Ilorin Mini Campus, Oja-Oba, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Kwara Discovery Planetarium
items.short_description: Explore the wonders of the universe in our state-of-the-art planetarium, with engaging shows and astronomy exhibits for all ages.
items.address: Opposite Federal Secretariat, Ahmadu Bello Way, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Eco-Science Kids Zone
items.short_description: Focusing on environmental science and sustainability, this center offers hands-on activities about nature, recycling, and ecosystems.
items.address: Adjacent to Kwara State Zoological Garden, Sango, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Tech Explorers Workshop
items.short_description: A hands-on workshop and exhibition space where kids can experiment with robotics, coding, and digital design.
items.address: Along Pipeline Road, Tanke, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Grand Adventure Park Ilorin
items.short_description: An expansive outdoor adventure park featuring climbing frames, zip lines, obstacle courses, and safe play areas for all ages.
items.address: Near Federal Housing Estate, Tanke, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Sky High Playland Kwara
items.short_description: A multi-level indoor playground with soft play areas, slides, and tunnels, perfect for energetic kids on any day.
items.address: Within Palms Mall, Fate Road, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Jungle Quest Adventure Ground
items.short_description: An exciting jungle-themed park with treehouses, swing bridges, and nature trails, encouraging imaginative outdoor exploration.
items.address: Near Federal Polytechnic Offa Liaison Office, Asa Dam Road, Ilorin, Kwara State

items.name: Emerald Greens Family Park
items.short_description: A serene park featuring modern playgrounds, picnic areas, and open spaces for sports and casual family outings.
items.address: Along Airport Road, Off Fate Road, Ilorin, Kwara State
